content:
"""Divide a by b.
    
    Args:
        a: The dividend (numerator)
        b: The divisor (denominator)
    
    Returns:
        The result of a divided by b
    
    Raises:
        ValueError: If b is zero
    """
description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0. Also add proper error handling for division by zero to raise a more informative error. - Improve the docstring to document the function behavior, parameters, return value, and exceptions

metadata.solution_description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0. Also add proper error handling for division by zero to raise a more informative error.
